title: Literally Making Money
description:
This week, Slate Money talk about Libra, Facebook’s new cryptocurrency, the merits of upzoning and the Beyond Meat IPO. And in the Slate Plus segment: The billionaire who bought Sotheby’s.  Email: slatemoney@slate.comTwitter: @felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas,@EmilyRPeck
Podcast production by Jessamine Molli. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
